meme.title: Sandi Toksvig's advice: "stick em up on YouTube... make, er, you know, egg timer films"
meme.alt:
Sandi Toksvig's advice: "stick em up on YouTube, I think I would make, er, you know, egg timer films, kind of 4 minute films and try and do some comedy in that time, and er, and er, make sure you just get the word out of what you are doing. 

I don't think you necessarily have to wait on the big agents and the big producers any more. You can get out and do it yourself."
meme.caption:
Sandi Toksvig's advice: "stick em up on YouTube, I think I would make, er, you know, egg timer films, kind of 4 minute films and try and do some comedy in that time, and er, and er, make sure you just get the word out of what you are doing. 

I don't think you necessarily have to wait on the big agents and the big producers any more. You can get out and do it yourself."
